title: Inspect Task-Graph Response
description: Information about a **task-graph** as known by the scheduler, with all the state of all individual tasks.

tasks.title: Tasks
tasks.description: Mapping from task-labels to task information and state.

items.title: Task Information
items.description: Information about a tasks in the task-graph

taskId.title: Task Identifier
taskId.description: Unique task identifier, this is UUID encoded as [URL-safe base64](http://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc4648#section-5) and stripped of `=` padding.

name.title: Name
name.description: Human readable name from the task definition

items.title: Required `taskId`
items.description: `taskId` for task that is required to be _successfully completed_ before this task is scheduled.

requiresLeft.title: Required tasks left
requiresLeft.description: List of `taskId`s that have yet to complete successfully, before this task can be scheduled.

items.title: Required `taskId`
items.description: `taskId` for task that is required to be _successfully completed_ before this task is scheduled.

reruns.title: Re-runs
reruns.description: Number of times to _rerun_ the task if it completed unsuccessfully. **Note**, this does not capture _retries_ due to infrastructure issues.

rerunsLeft.title: Re-runs Left
rerunsLeft.description: Number of reruns that haven't been used yet.

state.title: Task Node State
state.description: State of the task as considered by the scheduler

satisfied.title: Task Satisfied
satisfied.description: true, if the scheduler considers the task node as satisfied and hence no-longer prevents dependent tasks from running.

dependents.title: Dependent tasks
dependents.description: List of `taskId`s that requires this task to be _complete successfully_ before they can be scheduled.

items.title: Dependent `taskId`
items.description: `taskId` for task that requires this task to be _successfully completed_ before it can be scheduled.

description.title: Description
description.description: Human readable description of task-graph, **explain** what it does!

owner.title: Owner
owner.description: E-mail of person who caused this task-graph, e.g. the person who did `hg push`

source.title: Source
source.description: Link to source of this task-graph, should specify file, revision and repository

tags.title: Tags
tags.description: Arbitrary key-value tags (only strings limited to 4k)

scopes.title: Scopes
scopes.description: List of scopes (or scope-patterns) that tasks of the task-graph is authorized to use.

items.title: Scope
items.description: A scope (or scope-patterns) which a task of the task-graph is authorized to use. This can be a string or a string ending with `*` which will authorize all scopes for which the string is a prefix.
